line_1: The pillars of the Lord are seven,
line_2: Which stand from earth to topmost heav'n;

line_1: To count with fingers six or seven,
line_2: And mind that syllables are even, —

line_1: And tho' no Science, fairly worth the Seven.
line_2: Good Sense, which only is the Gift of Heav'n,

line_1: And You fly fast: and 'tis but Seven.
line_2: 'Tis far indeed from hence to Heav'n:

line_1: Some six years since, or (some say) seven;
line_2: To claim the great man's promise given
